overview: Studio 2000 International and director extrodionare John Travis continue their tour around the world in sixty-nine ways with the brazenly beautiful, erotic epic Barcelona Bound. Shot entirely on location in Spain, John Travis clearly looked long and hard for just the right cast because in Barcelona Bound he has outdone even himself. Every model is handsome, raven- haired, dark- eyed, uncut and horse-hung. One would be hard pressed to find another video with so many gorgeous guys all waving such big boners.
tagline: Studio 2000 International and ultra-talented director John Travis have made Barcelona Bound a man-drenched masterpiece. Don't miss taking this tumescent trip with shooting star Rafael Carreras as your tour guide.
title: Barcelona Bound
